title: Delicate Diamond and Pink Sapphire Floral Drop Earrings - "Pushpa Jhumka"
materials: 18K Rose Gold. Featuring round cut diamonds
totaling 2.25 carats. Accentuated with stunning natural Pink Sapphires.
features: These earrings showcase a beautiful floral design. The delicate rose gold branches support diamond-studded petals, surrounding a vibrant pink sapphire center. The design provides a modern twist on the traditional Jhumka, suitable for both casual and formal wear.
occasions: or as a sophisticated gift. Also great for cocktail parties
description: These earrings offer a perfect blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The floral motif symbolizes beauty and prosperity, making them a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds and sapphires ensure lasting brilliance, and the rose gold setting enhances the gemstones' natural beauty.
